Packages that use AccelerometerListener
edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.filter Provides filters for calculating position and orientation using accelerometer, magnetometer, and optionally gyroscope 
edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.sensor Provides particle filter interface implementations for Wifi and GSM localization 
 

Uses of AccelerometerListener in edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.filter
 

Subinterfaces of AccelerometerListener in edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.filter
 interface PedestrianLocalization
          Interface for methods of localizing pedestrians.
 

Classes in edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.filter that implement AccelerometerListener
 class PedestrianLocalization_Gyro
          Localizes pedestrians using an OrientationFilter for heading determination and the standard deviation method for detecting movement.
 class PedestrianLocalization_StandardDeviation
          Localizes pedestrians using accelerometer and magnetometer for heading, and standard deviation method for movement detection
 class PedestrianLocalization_StepDetection
          Localizes pedestrians using accelerometer and magnetometer for heading, and step detection method for tracking movement
